name: Regigigas
flavorText: There is an enduring legend that states this Pokémon towed continents with ropes.

attacks.name: Drag Off
attacks.text: Before doing damage, you may choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and switch it with the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Giga Hammer
attacks.text: Regigigas can't use Giga Hammer during your next turn.
